nodes.bodyText: Need to create the index in DynamoDB before pushing these changes

For every record:

Get all records with the same hostName / provider / service (uuid can be different)
Check which one is the most up to date (biggest currentTime).
Check if it is the same record we evaluate now. If it is we will send a notification if not we'll skip it.
